title: Appleseed companion
content:
Hi,

Can anyone recommend a good companion to the Appleseed font? [http://fonthead.com/font-sampler.php?l=1&font=appleseed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905213007/http:/fonthead.com/font-sampler.php?l=1&font=appleseed "http://fonthead.com/font-sampler.php?l=1&font=appleseed")

Ideally I am looking for something which is like a regular non-italic version of the same face but without the rough edges. I wish to use it for a poster heading titled ’Sun & Wind’ with ’Wind’ being in the Applescript font.

Thank you in advance for any suggestions.
